  • java.lang.Object

      • org.apache.lucene.codecs.lucene41.Lucene41PostingsReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Accountable
    Deprecated. 
    only for reading old 4.x segments

public final class Lucene41PostingsReader
extends PostingsReaderBase
    Lucene 4.1 postings format.
